Board_Members: Information not available in the contract

Effective_Date: Information not available in the contract
End_Date: Information not available in the contract
Membership_Description: Information not available in the contract
Europe_Coverage_Duration: Information not available in the contract
Worldwide_Coverage_Duration: Information not available in the contract
Services_Provided: Medical repatriation, roadside assistance, towing, vehicle opening assistance, rental car costs, accommodation costs, children's repatriation, KS emergency service, vehicle transport, spare parts shipment, vehicle storage, customs clearance, scrapping, replacement driver, replacement of travel documents, replacement of funds, medical care, medicine shipment, hospital visits, children's repatriation, help in case of death, travel cancellation costs, travel recall service, help in special emergencies, interpreter costs
Roadside_Assistance: Up to 110 EUR including costs of any attempted roadside assistance. Covers jump starts.
Accident_Assistance: Information not available in the contract
Medical_Transport: Medical repatriation worldwide in unlimited amount if medically necessary.
Vehicle_Recovery: Unlimited recovery costs of the vehicle that has driven off the road.
Legal_Support: Information not available in the contract
Service_Exclusions: Information not available in the contract
Covered_Vehicles: Vehicles registered in the name of the policyholder in Germany, as well as foreign passenger cars used by the policyholder. This also includes station wagons, motorcycles, mopeds, motorhomes up to 3.5t GVW (excluding rental), and bicycles.
Insured_Persons: The policyholder and all entitled occupants of the insured vehicles.
Additional_Members: Family members: spouse/registered or other life partner named in the insurance policy, minor children, unmarried, non-registered or other life partner living full-time children, but only until they first start a long-term professional activity and receive performance-related remuneration, parents living in the policyholder's household, registered there and retired.
Membership_Costs: Private customer protection letter: 49 EUR, Private customer protection letter for the family: 64 EUR, Business customer protection letter: 49 EUR
Service_Limitations: Maximum 7 days and 52 EUR per day plus additional costs up to 100 EUR for rental car costs. Accommodation costs up to 80 EUR per person for one night. If no travel costs are incurred, accommodation costs will be covered for up to 3 nights at 80 EUR per person per night. Maximum reimbursement of 1540 EUR per insured person for children's repatriation.
Max_Payout_Limit: Unlimited for medical repatriation, unlimited for vehicle recovery, 1540 EUR per insured person for children's repatriation

extra.Family_Definition: Family members are: a) the spouse / registered or other life partner named in the insurance policy, b) the minor children, c) the unmarried, non-registered or other life partner living full-time children, but only until they first start a long-term professional activity and receive performance-related remuneration, d) the parents living in the policyholder's household, registered there and retired.
extra.Policy_Features: No mileage restriction. Customers can freely choose which company provides assistance, e.g. a towing service, the customer's workshop or a company commissioned by KS Versicherungs-AG. The protection letters are also indispensable for air or rail travel. They offer numerous personal services such as medical repatriation or the repatriation of children. If a rental vehicle is used abroad instead of the insured vehicle, this vehicle is covered by the insurance.
extra.Founded_Date: The KS Versicherungs-AG was founded in 1979.
extra.Benefits_For_Club_Members: If the requirements for club services are met, the maximum amounts from KS club membership and the protection letter are added. This applies to roadside assistance, towing, vehicle opening assistance, and medical repatriation.
